attributes.description: Comprehensive dashboard for detecting Russian APT activity across Falco runtime alerts, Suricata network IDS, and Kubernetes audit logs. Provides real-time visibility into IOCs, C2 communications, and lateral movement attempts.

attributes.title: APT Detection Dashboard - Russian APT Activity

attributes.description: Index pattern for all security events collected by the IDS/IPS pipeline
attributes.name: security-events-*
attributes.title: security-events-*

attributes.description: Index pattern for Falco runtime security alerts
attributes.name: falco-alerts-*
attributes.title: falco-alerts-*

attributes.description: Index pattern for Suricata network IDS alerts
attributes.name: suricata-alerts-*
attributes.title: suricata-alerts-*

attributes.description: Index pattern for correlated APT detection events
attributes.name: apt-detections-*
attributes.title: apt-detections-*
